title: Facilitate a Risk and Control Self-Assessment (RCSA)
description: An auditor facilitates an RCSA workshop with a business unit to help them identify and assess their own risks and controls.

tasks.description: Prepare for the workshop by creating a template for the business unit to use for documenting their risks and controls.
tasks.expected_outcome: A standardized RCSA template is created.

tasks.description: Lead the workshop, guiding the business team through the process of identifying risks in their key processes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The business team identifies and documents their top 10 operational risks.

tasks.description: Use the results of the RCSA to inform the scope of the upcoming audit of that business unit.
tasks.expected_outcome: The audit plan is updated to focus on the highest-rated risks identified by the business itself.
